name: Flare
description:
Get back to the 50s and race your friends on a world where everything is owned by On Wagons, a malevolous train company that owns almost everything.

Jump on the Duster or the Fermandi,outstyle your enemies  and drift your way to the finish line. 

Wanna make your enemies explode? just launch them a rocket or leave a dynamite behind. Do you prefer to make them slower at the worst possible turn? Leave a cactus and temporarily puncture their wheels. If your style is being the fastest one just use the turbo and gain advantage through the shortcuts.

If you think you can beat On Wagons' minions, try the Single Player and make them regret that you downloaded this game. Each time an On Wagons' minion loose, they loose more power. There are more than 700 to win, can you beat and find them all?

Warning: The multiplayer is self-hosted by us. It may not be active at the moment that you try-it. If it's not working properly and it's active, check that you have the last version downloaded from here.
